#include<iostream>
#include<bitset>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
 
const int N = 53000;
bitset<N+5> v;
void seive(){
    v.set();
    for(int i =2;i<=N;i+=2)v[i] = 0;
    v[0]=v[1] = 0;v[2]=1;
    int val = sqrt(N);
    for(int i =3;i<=val+1;i+=2){
        if(v[i])
        for(int j = i*i;j<=N;j+=(i+i)){
            v[j] = false;
        }
    }
}
 
LL next(int n ){
    LL i,j;
    for(i =n+1;i<=N;i++){
        if(v[i])break;
    }
    for(j=i+1;j<=N;j++){
        if(v[j])break;
    }
    return i*j;
}
 
int main(){
    int T;
    seive();
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--){
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        LL res = next(n);
        printf("%lld\n",res);
    }
    return 0;
}
